com.microsoft.azure.v2.management

Class Azure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.v2.management.Azure

  • public final class Azure
extends Object
    The entry point for accessing resource management APIs in Azure.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Azure.Authenticated
      Provides authenticated access to a subset of Azure APIs that do not require a specific subscription.
      static interface  Azure.Configurable
      The interface allowing configurations to be made on the client.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static Azure.Authenticated authenticate(com.microsoft.azure.v2.credentials.AzureTokenCredentials credentials)
        Authenticate to Azure using an Azure credentials object.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials object
        Returns:
        the authenticated Azure client

      • authenticate

        public static Azure.Authenticated authenticate(File credentialsFile)
                                        throws IOException
        Authenticates API access using a properties file containing the required credentials.
        Parameters:
        credentialsFile - the file containing the credentials in the standard Java properties file format, with the following keys:

        subscription= #subscription ID
        tenant= #tenant ID
        client= #client id
        key= #client key
        managementURI= #management URI
        baseURL= #base URL
        authURL= #authentication URL

        Returns:
        authenticated Azure client
        Throws:
        IOException - exception thrown from file access

      • authenticate

        public static Azure.Authenticated authenticate(com.microsoft.rest.v2.http.HttpPipeline httpPipeline,
                                               com.microsoft.azure.v2.AzureEnvironment environment,
                                               String tenantId)
        Authenticates API access using a RestClient instance.
        Parameters:
        httpPipeline - the HttpPipeline configured with Azure authentication credentials
        environment - the azure environment
        tenantId - the tenantId in Active Directory
        Returns:
        authenticated Azure client

      • authenticate

        public static Azure.Authenticated authenticate(com.microsoft.rest.v2.http.HttpPipeline httpPipeline,
                                               com.microsoft.azure.v2.AzureEnvironment environment,
                                               String tenantId,
                                               String subscriptionId)
        Authenticates API access using a RestClient instance.
        Parameters:
        httpPipeline - the HttpPipeline configured with Azure authentication credentials
        tenantId - the tenantId in Active Directory
        environment - the azure environment
        subscriptionId - the ID of the subscription
        Returns:
        authenticated Azure client
